info.name: AdminSuite API - DepEd School Management
info.description:
Complete API collection for AdminSuite - School Management System for DepEd Administrative Officers

**Base URL:** http://localhost:8000

**Authentication:** Bearer Token (Laravel Sanctum)

**Default Test Credentials:**
- Super Admin: superadmin@deped.gov.ph / SuperAdmin123!
- School Head: schoolhead@deped.gov.ph / SchoolHead123!
- Admin Officer: adminofficer@deped.gov.ph / AdminOfficer123!
- Teacher: teacher@deped.gov.ph / Teacher123!

request.description: Register a new user account. Default role: Teacher/Staff
Get paginated list of employees with optional filters

body.raw:
{
    "first_name": "Pedro",
    "middle_name": "Cruz",
    "last_name": "Santos",
    "date_of_birth": "1985-05-15",
    "gender": "Male",
    "civil_status": "Married",
    "email": "pedro.santos@deped.gov.ph",

request.description: Promote employee to new position (auto-creates service record)
Get employee statistics (counts by status, position)

Cancel leave request (auto-restores credits if already approved)
Get all pending leave requests requiring action
Get leave statistics for specific employee

item.description: Leave request management with approval workflow

item.name: HR - Trainings

request.description: Get paginated list of all training records with optional filters
Get specific training details by ID
Get all training records for a specific employee
Get only completed training records for a specific employee
Get trainings filtered by type (Seminar, Workshop, Conference, etc.)
Get trainings conducted in a specific year

query.description: Optional: Get stats for specific employee

request.description: Get training statistics (total trainings, hours, LD units, type breakdown, yearly breakdown)

item.name: Inventory - Items

request.description: Get paginated list of all inventory items with optional filters
Get all inventory items with their current stock balances from stock cards
Get items with stock levels below the specified threshold
Get inventory statistics including total items, values, and category breakdown
Search inventory items by code, name, description, property number, or serial number
Get specific inventory item details by ID
Get specific inventory item with its current stock balance

Record inventory stock out transaction (validates sufficient balance)

Add expense item to liquidation (auto-recalculates totals)

item.description: Cash advance liquidation with automatic calculations and cash advance status updates
